thread.title: US bankruptcy judge plans approval of Patriot Coal assets
thread.title_full: US bankruptcy judge plans approval of Patriot Coal assets

title: US bankruptcy judge plans approval of Patriot Coal assets
text:
Published By: Beaumont Enterprise - Today 
Scott Depot, West Virginia-based Patriot says most of its operating assets will be sold to Lexington, Kentucky-based Blackhawk Mining LLC.
